pack.name: Stormlight RPG Core (Data Pack)
pack.notes: Culture records aligned to cultural expertises in docs/stormlight_pack.initial.v1.json.

records.name: Alethi
records.rules_text: Alethi culture encompasses princedoms, dialects, and Vorin traditions tied to Alethkar and its people.

records.name: Azish
records.rules_text: Azish culture centers on bureaucracy, civic procedure, and the traditions of the Azish Empire.

records.name: Herdazian
records.rules_text: Herdazian culture emphasizes ranching families, Vorin traditions, and close-knit cousinly ties.

records.name: Iriali
records.rules_text: Iriali culture follows the One and the Long Trail, with traditions shaped by travel and the Iriali Triumvirate.

records.name: Kharbranthian
records.rules_text: Kharbranthian culture prizes scholarship and medicine, supported by the City of Bells and its institutions.
